rules: Rule1: If the compound is patented, then it is safe.
Rule2: Either the compound is rejected, or it is licensed, or it is patented.
Rule3: Provided that the compound is recalled, it is withdrawn.
Rule4: The compound is recalled or it is suspended.
Rule5: In the event that the compound is suspended, it is not rejected.
Rule6: If the compound is produced, then it is manufactured.
Rule7: Either the compound is produced or it is packaged.
Rule8: Given that the compound is packaged, it is safe.
Rule9: Whenever the compound is distributed, it is marketed.
Rule10: Provided that the compound is distributed, it is not sold.
Rule11: If the compound is synthesized, then if it is not safe, it is approved.
Rule12: The compound is synthesized or it is tested.
Rule13: If the compound is promoted, then it is endorsed.
Rule14: Provided that the compound is endorsed, it is advertised.
Rule15: Should the compound be stored, it is safe.
Rule16: If the compound is refrigerated, then it is safe.
Rule17: Given that the compound is warehoused, it is stored.
Rule18: The compound is warehoused or it is preserved.
Rule19: In the event that the compound is preserved, it is refrigerated.
Rule20: Whenever the process is documented, it is recorded.
Rule21: If the compound is tested, then it is identified.
Rule22: If the process is recorded, then if it is not the case that if the compound is tested then it is analyzed implies that the compound is not contaminated, then the process is approved.
Rule23: If the process is reviewed, then if it is not the case that if the compound is tested then it is analyzed implies that the compound is not contaminated, then the process is certified.
Rule24: Provided that the process is modified, it is optimized.
Rule25: Should the process be modified, it is altered.
Rule26: If the process is improved, then if it is altered, it is not optimized.
Rule27: The process is improved or it is adjusted.
Rule28: In the event that the process is adjusted, then if it is altered, it is not optimized.
Rule29: If the compound is purified, then if it is not safe, it is approved.
Rule30: Whenever the compound is characterized, it is analyzed.
Rule31: Provided that the compound is identified, it is characterized.
Rule32: If the decision is appealed, then it is overturned.
Rule33: Either the decision is upheld or it is not overturned.
Rule34: Given that the application is filed, the compound is registered.
Rule35: The application is filed or it is submitted.
Rule36: If the application is submitted, then the compound is patented.
Rule37: Provided that the compound is analyzed, it is purified.
Rule38: If the application is processed, then if it is not the case that if the compound is registered then it is licensed, the application is rejected.
Rule39: Should the production be scaled, the compound is manufactured.
Rule40: Either the production is scaled or it is expanded.
Rule41: If the production is managed, then if it is expanded, the compound is safe.
Rule42: In the event that the distribution is restricted, the compound is not distributed.
Rule43: Whenever the distribution is limited, the compound is not distributed.
Rule44: Provided that the distribution is controlled, it is restricted.
Rule45: The distribution is controlled or it is regulated.
Rule46: Given that the company is penalized, it is not fined.
Rule47: In the case that the compound is supplied, it is sold.
Rule48: If the distribution is authorized, then if the compound is distributed, it is supplied.
Rule49: Whenever the distribution is permitted, then if the compound is distributed, it is supplied.
Rule50: Provided that the process is validated, then if the compound is tested then it is analyzed, the compound is not contaminated.
Rule51: The process is validated or it is verified.
Rule52: Either the batch is released or it is not quarantined.
Rule53: If the compound is stable, then it is stored or it is refrigerated.
Rule54: Should the compound be unsafe, it is not effective.
Rule55: Given that the process is verified, then if the compound is tested then it is analyzed, the compound is not contaminated.
Rule56: In the event that the compound is licensed, it is safe.
Rule57: If it is not the case that if the compound is recalled then it is not rejected, then the compound is investigated.
Rule58: Should it not be the case that if the compound is marketed then it is sold, the compound is promoted.
Rule59: If it is not the case that if the compound is marketed then it is sold, then the compound is misrepresented.
Rule60: Given that it is not the case that if the compound is marketed then it is sold, the compound is not advertised.
Rule61: In the event that it is not the case that if the compound is tested then it is purified, the process is modified.
Rule62: Whenever it is not the case that if the compound is tested then it is analyzed, the compound is contaminated.
Rule63: Provided that it is not the case that if the process is audited then it is reviewed, the process is monitored.
Rule64: Should it not be the case that if the compound is withdrawn then it is not rejected, the decision is appealed.
Rule65: In the case that it is not the case that if the distribution is regulated then it is limited, the distribution is banned.
Rule66: If it is not the case that if the distribution is regulated then it is limited, then the distribution is not banned.
Rule67: Whenever it is not the case that if the claim is corrected then the compound is not misrepresented, the company is fined.
Rule68: Provided that it is not the case that if the claim is corrected then the compound is not misrepresented, the company is penalized.
Rule69: If it is not the case that the distribution is authorized or it is permitted, then the distribution is prohibited.
Rule70: Whenever it is not the case that if the compound is tested then it is analyzed implies that the compound is not contaminated, the process is not approved.
Rule71: Provided that it is not the case that if it is not the case that the batch is recalled or the compound is not distributed then the batch is destroyed, the batch is quarantined.
Rule72: Should the compound not be stable, it is effective.
Rule73: If the compound is not stable, then it is unsafe.
Rule74: Whenever the compound is not safe, it is distributed.
facts: Fact6: The compound is not approved.
Fact7: The compound is not investigated.
Fact8: The compound is not manufactured.
Fact9: The process is not certified.
Fact10: The process is not monitored.
Fact11: The decision is not upheld.
Fact12: The application is not rejected.
Fact13: The distribution is not prohibited.
Fact14: The batch is not recalled.
Fact15: The batch is not destroyed.
Fact16: The batch is not released.
